description: This is the protocol accompanying the "pLKO.1 – TRC Cloning Vector". For information about the PLKO.1-TRC cloning vector and tips on designing shRNA oligos for pLKO.1 see Addgene's website: http://www.addgene.org/tools/protocols/plko/

components.data: Resuspend oligos in ddH2O to a concentration of 20 μM.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend oligos in ddH2O to a concentration of 20 μM.
Add 5ul Forward oligo
Add 5ul Reverse oligo
Add 5 μL	10x NEB buffer 2
Add 35 μL ddH2O

components.data: Incubate for 4 minutes at 95°C in a PCR machine or in a beaker of boiling water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate for 4 minutes at 95°C in a PCR machine or in a beaker of boiling water.

components.data: Incubate the sample at 70°C for 10 minutes in a PCR machine.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the sample at 70°C for 10 minutes in a PCR machine.

components.data: Slowly cool to room temperature over the period of several hours.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Slowly cool to room temperature over the period of several hours.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 8 of Cloning shRNA Oligos into pLKO.1
source_data.annotation: This will take a few hours, but it is important for the cooling to occur slowly for the oligos to anneal.
source_data.thread_text: This will take a few hours, but it is important for the cooling to occur slowly for the oligos to anneal.
source_data.body: This will take a few hours, but it is important for the cooling to occur slowly for the oligos to anneal.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 8 of Cloning shRNA Oligos into pLKO.1
source_data.annotation: If using a beaker of water, remove the beaker from the flame, and allow the water to cool to room temperature.
source_data.thread_text: If using a beaker of water, remove the beaker from the flame, and allow the water to cool to room temperature.
source_data.body: If using a beaker of water, remove the beaker from the flame, and allow the water to cool to room temperature.

components.data: Mix: 6 μg pLKO.1 TRC-cloning vector (maxiprep or miniprep DNA)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix: 6 μg pLKO.1 TRC-cloning vector (maxiprep or miniprep DNA)
with 5 μL	10x NEB buffer 1
with 1 μL	AgeI
bring to 50 μL	ddH2O
Incubate at 37°C for 2 hours.

components.data: Purify with Qiaquick gel extraction kit, eluting in 30 μL of ddH2O.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Purify with Qiaquick gel extraction kit, eluting in 30 μL of ddH2O.

components.data: Digest eluate with EcoRI by mixing: 30 μL pLKO.1 TRC-cloning vector digested with AgeI
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Digest eluate with EcoRI by mixing: 30 μL pLKO.1 TRC-cloning vector digested with AgeI

components.data: with 5 μL	10x NEB buffer for EcoRI
components.name: Description

source_data.description: with 5 μL	10x NEB buffer for EcoRI
with 1 μL	EcoRI
and 14 μL	ddH2O
Incubate at 37°C for 2 hours.

components.data: Run digested DNA on 0.8% low melting point agarose gel until you can distinctly see 2 bands, one 7kb and one 1.9kb.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run digested DNA on 0.8% low melting point agarose gel until you can distinctly see 2 bands, one 7kb and one 1.9kb.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 20 of Cloning shRNA Oligos into pLKO.1
source_data.annotation: When visualizing DNA fragments to be used for ligation, use only long-wavelength UV light. Short wavelength UV light will increase the chance of damaging the DNA.
source_data.thread_text: When visualizing DNA fragments to be used for ligation, use only long-wavelength UV light. Short wavelength UV light will increase the chance of damaging the DNA.
source_data.body: When visualizing DNA fragments to be used for ligation, use only long-wavelength UV light. Short wavelength UV light will increase the chance of damaging the DNA.

components.data: Cut out the 7kb band and place in a sterile microcentrifuge tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cut out the 7kb band and place in a sterile microcentrifuge tube.

components.data: Purify the DNA using a Qiaquick gel extraction kit. Elute in 30 μL of ddH2O.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Purify the DNA using a Qiaquick gel extraction kit. Elute in 30 μL of ddH2O.
Measure the DNA concentration.

components.data: Use your ligation method of choice. For a standard T4 ligation, mix: 2 μL	annealed oligo from "Annealing Oligos" section above.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Use your ligation method of choice. For a standard T4 ligation, mix: 2 μL	annealed oligo from "Annealing Oligos" section above.

components.data: With 20 ng digested pLKO.1 TRC-cloning vector from the "Digesting pLKO.1 TRC Cloning Vector" section above.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: With 20 ng digested pLKO.1 TRC-cloning vector from the "Digesting pLKO.1 TRC Cloning Vector" section above.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 25 of Cloning shRNA Oligos into pLKO.1
source_data.annotation: If you were unable to measure the DNA concentration, use 1 μL
source_data.thread_text: If you were unable to measure the DNA concentration, use 1 μL
source_data.body: If you were unable to measure the DNA concentration, use 1 μL

components.data: With 2 μL	10x NEB T4 DNA ligase buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: With 2 μL	10x NEB T4 DNA ligase buffer

source_data.reagent_name: T4 DNA Ligase Reaction Buffer - 6.0 ml

components.data: With 1 μL	NEB T4 DNA ligase
components.name: Description

source_data.description: With 1 μL	NEB T4 DNA ligase
Bring up to 20ul with ddH2O
Incubate at 16°C for 4-20 hours.

components.data: Transform 2 μL of ligation mix into 25 μL competent DH5 alpha cells, following manufacturer’s protocol.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transform 2 μL of ligation mix into 25 μL competent DH5 alpha cells, following manufacturer’s protocol.

components.data: Plate on LB agar plates containing 100 μg/mL ampicillin or carbenicillin (an ampicillin analog).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Plate on LB agar plates containing 100 μg/mL ampicillin or carbenicillin (an ampicillin analog).
